00017 import tkinter, tkinter.tix # Tix is for the combobox
00018 
00019 class csys(tkinter.tix.Toplevel):
00020     """GUI.widgets.csys.csys class(rootApp, csys=None)\n\n \
00021 
00022 Tkinter.Toplevel like widget to collect information for either constructing a \
00023 new coordinate system or editing an existing one (case csys !=None).\n\n \
00024 \
00025 Parameters:\n\n \
00026 \
00027 Input: \n\n \
00028 csys - the coordinate system to be edited.\n\n \
00029 \
00030 Output: \n\n \
00031 ..."""
00032     def __init__(self, master, csys=None):
00033         tkinter.tix.Toplevel.__init__(self, master)
00034         self.master=master
00035         self.csys=csys
00036         self.clabel=tkinter.StringVar()
00037         self.parent=tkinter.StringVar()
00038         self.originX=tkinter.StringVar()
00039         self.originY=tkinter.StringVar()
00040         self.rotation=tkinter.StringVar()
00041         self.typec=tkinter.StringVar()
00042 
00043         self.visible=tkinter.IntVar()
00044 
00045         if self.csys != None: # editing a csys entity
00046             self.originX.set(str(self.csys.origin[0]))
00047             self.originY.set(str(self.csys.origin[1]))
00048             self.parent.set(self.csys.parent.label)
00049             self.clabel.set(self.csys.label)
00050             self.rotation.set(str(self.csys.rotation))
00051             self.typec.set(self.csys.type)
00052             self.title("Edit Coordinate System")
00053         else:
00054             self.originX.set("")
00055             self.originY.set("")
00056             self.parent.set("")
00057             self.clabel.set("")
00058             self.rotation.set("0")
00059             self.typec.set("")
00060             self.title("Add Coordinate System")
00061 
00062         self.resizable(height="false", width="false")
00063 
00064         self.firstCoord=tkinter.StringVar()
00065         self.secondCoord=tkinter.StringVar()
00066 
00067         self.firstCoord.set("X origin")
00068         self.secondCoord.set("Y origin")
00069 
00070         # create widgets here (but don't display them)
00071 
00072         self.csysLabel=tkinter.Label(self, text="Coordinate System Label", anchor=tkinter.W)
00073 
00074         self.csysEntry=tkinter.Entry(self, textvariable=self.clabel)
00075 
00076         self.parentLabel=tkinter.Label(self, text="Coordinate System Parent")
00077         self.parentCombo=tkinter.tix.ComboBox(self, label=None, dropdown=1, editable=0, height=4, variable=self.parent)
00078 
00079         self.parentCombo.set_silent('global')
00080 
00081         for i in list(self.master.DrawingArea.csys.keys()):
00082             self.parentCombo.insert(tkinter.tix.END, i)
00083 
00084         self.origXLabel=tkinter.Label(self, textvariable=self.firstCoord, anchor=tkinter.W)
00085         self.origXEntry=tkinter.Entry(self, textvariable=self.originX)
00086 
00087         self.typeLabel=tkinter.Label(self, text="Coordinate System Type ", anchor=tkinter.W)
00088         self.typeCombo=tkinter.tix.ComboBox(self, label=None, dropdown=1, editable=0, command=self.__setPolar, height=3, variable=self.typec)
00089 
00090         self.typeCombo.set_silent('cartesian')
00091 
00092         self.typeCombo.insert(tkinter.tix.END, 'cartesian')
00093         self.typeCombo.insert(tkinter.tix.END, 'polar')
00094 
00095         self.origYLabel=tkinter.Label(self, textvariable=self.secondCoord, anchor=tkinter.W)
00096         self.origYEntry=tkinter.Entry(self, textvariable=self.originY)
00097 
00098         self.rotLabel=tkinter.Label(self, text="Rotation", anchor=tkinter.W)
00099         self.rotEntry=tkinter.Entry(self, textvariable=self.rotation)
00100 
00101         self.ckButton=tkinter.Checkbutton(self, anchor=tkinter.W, indicatoron=1, offvalue=0, onvalue=1, text="Visible", variable=self.visible)
00102         self.ckButton.select()
00103 
00104         self.okButton=tkinter.Button(self, text="Ok", command=self.__cbOk, width=6)
00105         self.cancelButton=tkinter.Button(self, text="Cancel", command=self.__cbCancel, width=6)
00106 
00107         self.showWidgets()
00108 
00109     def showWidgets(self):
00110 
00111         # upper row
00112 
00113         self.csysLabel.grid(row=0, column=0, padx=(10, 5), pady=(12, 0), sticky=tkinter.W+tkinter.E)
00114         self.csysEntry.grid(row=0, column=1, columnspan=2, pady=(12, 0), padx=(0, 5))
00115 
00116         self.parentLabel.grid(row=0, column=3, pady=(12, 0), sticky=tkinter.W)
00117         self.parentCombo.grid(row=0, column=4, padx=(0, 10), pady=(12, 0), columnspan=2)
00118 
00119         # next row
00120 
00121         self.origXLabel.grid(row=1, column=0, sticky=tkinter.W+tkinter.E, padx=(10, 0))
00122         self.origXEntry.grid(row=1, column=1, columnspan=2, padx=(0, 5))
00123 
00124         self.typeLabel.grid(row=1, column=3, sticky=tkinter.W)
00125         self.typeCombo.grid(row=1, column=4, columnspan=2, padx=(0, 10))
00126 
00127         # next row
00128 
00129         self.origYLabel.grid(row=2, column=0, sticky=tkinter.W+tkinter.E, padx=(10, 0))
00130         self.origYEntry.grid(row=2, column=1, columnspan=2, padx=(0, 5))
00131 
00132         self.rotLabel.grid(row=2, column=3, sticky=tkinter.W+tkinter.E)
00133         self.rotEntry.grid(row=2, column=4, padx=(5, 10), sticky=tkinter.W+tkinter.E, columnspan=2)
00134 
00135         # next row
00136 
00137         self.ckButton.grid(row=3, column=0, sticky=tkinter.W, padx=(10, 0))
00138 
00139         self.okButton.grid(row=3, column=4, sticky=tkinter.E, padx=(0, 5), pady=(10, 12))
00140         self.cancelButton.grid(row=3, column=5, sticky=tkinter.W, pady=(10, 12), padx=(5, 10))
00141         self.mainloop()
00142 
00143     def __call__(self):
00144         return [self.clabel.get(), self.originX.get(), self.originY.get(), self.rotation.get(), self.typec.get(), self.parent.get(), self.visible.get()]
00145 
00146     def __cbOk(self):
00147         if self.clabel.get() == "" or self.originX.get() == "" or self.originY.get() == "" or self.rotation.get() == "":
00148             if self.clabel.get() == "":
00149                 self.csysEntry["bg"]="red"
00150             else:
00151                 self.csysEntry["bg"]="white"
00152             if self.originX.get() == "":
00153                 self.origXEntry["bg"]="red"
00154             else:
00155                 self.origXEntry["bg"]="white"
00156             if self.originY.get() == "":
00157                 self.origYEntry["bg"]="red"
00158             else:
00159                 self.origYEntry["bg"]="white"
00160             if self.rotation.get() == "":
00161                 self.rotEntry["bg"]="red"
00162             else:
00163                 self.rotEntry["bg"]="white"
00164         else:
00165             tester=0 # dummy var - 0 means Ok, 1 means it is not ok
00166             try: # test x coordinate
00167                 x=float(self.originX.get())
00168             except ValueError:
00169                 self.origXEntry["bg"]="red"
00170                 tester=1
00171             else:
00172                 self.origXEntry["bg"]="white"
00173 
00174             try: # test y coordinate
00175                 y=float(self.originY.get())
00176             except ValueError:
00177                 tester=1
00178                 self.origYEntry["bg"]="red"
00179             else:
00180                 self.origYEntry["bg"]="white"
00181 
00182             try: # test rotation parameter
00183                 r=float(self.rotation.get())
00184             except ValueError:
00185                 self.rotEntry["bg"]="red"
00186                 tester=1
00187             else:
00188                 self.rotEntry["bg"]="white"
00189 
00190             if tester == 0:
00191                 self.quit()
00192                 self.destroy()
00193 
00194     def __cbCancel(self):
00195         self.originX.set("")
00196         self.originY.set("")
00197         self.clabel.set("")
00198         self.typec.set("")
00199         self.quit()
00200         self.destroy()
00201 
00202     def __setPolar(self, event=0):
00203         if self.typec.get()=="polar":
00204             self.firstCoord.set("Polar axis")
00205             self.secondCoord.set("Polar angle")
00206             self.typeCombo.set_silent('polar')
00207 
00208         if self.typec.get()=="cartesian":
00209             self.firstCoord.set("X origin")
00210             self.secondCoord.set("Y origin")
00211             self.typeCombo.set_silent('cartesian')
00212 
00213         self.update_idletasks()
